remarks: Lemma for ~ plydivex .  Induction step.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)
statement:
plydiv.pl $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x + y ) e. S ) $.
plydiv.tm $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x x. y ) e. S ) $.
plydiv.rc $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ x =/= 0 ) ) -> ( 1 / x ) e. S ) $.
plydiv.m1 $e |- ( ph -> -u 1 e. S ) $.
plydiv.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
plydiv.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
plydiv.z $e |- ( ph -> G =/= 0p ) $.
plydiv.r $e |- R = ( F oF - ( G oF x. q ) ) $.
plydiv.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. NN0 ) $.
plydiv.e $e |- ( ph -> ( M - N ) = D ) $.
plydiv.fz $e |- ( ph -> F =/= 0p ) $.
plydiv.u $e |- U = ( f oF - ( G oF x. p ) ) $.
plydiv.h $e |- H = ( z e. CC |-> ( ( ( A ` M ) / ( B ` N ) ) x. ( z ^ D ) ) ) $.
plydiv.al $e |- ( ph -> A. f e. ( Poly ` S ) ( ( f = 0p \/ ( ( deg ` f ) - N ) < D ) -> E. p e. ( Poly ` S ) ( U = 0p \/ ( deg ` U ) < N ) ) ) $.
plydiv.a $e |- A = ( coeff ` F ) $.
plydiv.b $e |- B = ( coeff ` G ) $.
plydiv.m $e |- M = ( deg ` F ) $.
plydiv.n $e |- N = ( deg ` G ) $.
plydivlem4 $p |- ( ph -> E. q e. ( Poly ` S ) ( R = 0p \/ ( deg ` R ) < N ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d D f z $.
$d F f p q x y z $.
$d G f p q x y z $.
$d H f p q x y z $.
$d M x y z $.
$d N f p q x y z $.
$d R f p x y $.
$d S f p q x y z $.
$d p ph x y z $.
$d x y $.
